data.name: Hazard Ops: Anubis Pack
data.detailed_description:
The ancient Egyptians have been perfecting their weapons for centuries. Now their carefully guarded secrets have been brought to light and are sweeping the battlefields in the form of four merciless zombie punishers.

This pack is full of antique weapons in a timeless Anubis design that are specifically made for killing the undead…again. The included turrets will tear entire hordes to shreds, and the tech enhancement will boost your HP to record heights.

By the way: This pack also comes with 30 days of VIP access (+30% XP and Coins, VIP store access, and several buffs).

Weapons & Tech Enhancement

  • Fury of Nagual (permanent)
  • Anubis ZK107 (permanent)
  • Anubis Bow (7 days)
  • Hawker ZK-1 (7 days)
  • Deluxe Endorphin Pump (14 days)

Outfits

  • Pale Rider (M) (permanent)
  • Bronco Buster (F) (permanent)

Consumables

  • 30 days VIP Access
  • 5x Grenade Turret
  • 5x Cyclone Turret
  • 5x Revive Token
  • 1x Key Card
  • 1x Difficulty Unlock

Tap into that ancient magic and join the zombie hunt!

data.short_description: Don’t let these dusty old weapons fool you – they still have full zombie-killing potential! The ancient Egyptians developed secret weapon technology over hundreds of years, and this pack features the ultimate balance of design and firepower.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9800GT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Intel i-Series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT240 or newer (equals Radeon 3650 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
